---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/cardano/transfer/get-flow-status-transferred
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://cardano-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/55fcfcdd-b1f5-460c-bce9-8b8864461315' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `transfer_tx_broadcasting` to `completed`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {4}
{
  "id": "55fcfcdd-b1f5-460c-bce9-8b8864461315",
  "operation": "transfer",
  "state": "completed",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "from_account_address": "addr_test1qq37lp9qu5xnh45glqmhwx585kguz3k8jsqe95grjs6zp23j9mvvj53acfrj5mtsn2f5qp258uyrfvzrrrww409nxf3svhyew8",
    "to_account_address": "addr_test1qpr0vyprum2feg2340lmtx0gs3ye0qwnsagwqfhy5pfd5glrhsw5y2xnks9h9x5k6l7wyjdwumqggtnvrn3dyjtt28rsvy9lvz",
    "amount": "10.0",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "701e79cd816d453ac93018e9550b63c52b394808cfaf011f5b0c180793e4f7f7",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "701e79cd816d453ac93018e9550b63c52b394808cfaf011f5b0c180793e4f7f7",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": [
        {
          "account_address": "addr_test1qq37lp9qu5xnh45glqmhwx585kguz3k8jsqe95grjs6zp23j9mvvj53acfrj5mtsn2f5qp258uyrfvzrrrww409nxf3svhyew8",
          "signature": ""
        }
      ],
      "block_time": "2023-03-07T20:58:16.000Z"
    }
  },
  "network_code": "cardano",
  "chain_code": "preprod",
  "created_at": "2023-03-07T20:56:38.877Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-03-07T20:58:47.887Z"
}
```

### Token Transfer Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully transferred your ATOM tokens!
